fields.headline: Pick of the week: Comedy
fields.bodyText: Stephen Merchant Warwick Arts Centre, Coventry Tuesday 5 Ricky Gervais' better half starts a low key tour trying out new material with support from Glaswegian observational comedian Stephen Carlin. Bob Mills, Greg Davies The Glee Club, Birmingham Friday 8 Award-winning writer and ex-Win, Lose Or Draw host Mills features on a bill which also includes Davies from sketch troupe We Are Klang. Steve Gribbin The Glee Club, Birmingham Saturday 2 Songs, jokes and observations from veteran scouse alternative comedian Gribbin, performing as part of his silver jubilee year of being on the circuit.
